title: Define Project Requirements - UPDATED
description: Gather and document functional, non-functional, and technical requirements for the FunctionalTestingFramework project. This includes user stories, use cases, performance and scalability expectations (including specific benchmarks), security considerations (including threat modeling, potential vulnerabilities, and mitigation strategies), compatibility with existing testing frameworks, and any other relevant specifications. Additionally, identify key features and functionalities that the framework should provide to ensure its effectiveness in various scenarios.

title: Design the FunctionalTestingFramework
description: Create a high-level design for the testing framework based on functional programming principles and property-based testing.

title: Implement Property-Based Testing Module
description: Develop the core property-based testing functionality for the FunctionalTestingFramework.

title: Implement Function Composition for Test Case Generation
description: Develop the function composition feature to automate and simplify test case generation.

title: Write FunctionalTestingFramework Documentation
description: Create comprehensive and easy-to-understand documentation for the FunctionalTestingFramework.
dependencies: Implement Function Composition for Test Case Generation

title: Conduct Unit Tests
description: Write and execute unit tests to verify the individual components of the FunctionalTestingFramework.
dependencies: Implement Function Composition for Test Case Generation

title: Integration and System Tests
description: Combine individual units to test the overall functionality of the FunctionalTestingFramework.

title: Perform Security Audit
description: Assess and improve the security of the FunctionalTestingFramework to ensure safe usage.
dependencies: Implement Function Composition for Test Case Generation

title: Deploy the FunctionalTestingFramework
description: Prepare and deploy the FunctionalTestingFramework to a suitable environment.

title: Post-Deployment Testing and Monitoring
description: Test the deployed FunctionalTestingFramework and monitor its performance for any issues.
